verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy one
You've always been
You'll always be the king of kings

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mighty one
You know all things
You'll always be the king of kings

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You hold it all in Your hand
You hold it all in Your hand

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Worthy one
You stand alone
Yours is the throne forever

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Jesus Christ
You are the Lord
No one can ever take Your place

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You hold it all in Your hand
You hold it all in Your hand

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Only You can really make things right
Surely You will come and split the skies
Jesus, hear the longing of Your bride
Let Your kingdom come, come
Let Your kingdom come, come
